name: Jello Fuse
description:
Grab this unique new and exiting puzzle game for FREE!

Swipe up, down and all around to send your vibrant jellies sliding through the maze as you merge the jellies all over the maze. Complete the levels of each puzzle by merging the different colored jellies into one. It feels so satisfying, who doesn't love a satisfying jelly merge?

Jelly Fuse! Is the exciting free game you'll want to tell all your friends about. Which level can they get to?! Who can get the furthest?

Easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics!


FEATURES
- Unique and fun puzzles levels
- Smooth and satisfying Jelly Fuse action.
- Fun and relaxing to play
- Free to play
- Bright and colorful
- Loads of vibrant Jelly colors
- Simple and satisfying
- Beautifully clean and fluid Jelly Fuse physics
